name: OpenTokRTCV2
description: OpenTok RTC sample application to show off the OpenTok API and platform capabilities

TB_API_KEY.description: OpenTok API key: Login to the Tokbox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value.

TB_API_SECRET.description: OpenTok API secret: Login to the Tokbox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value.

FB_DATA_URL.description: URL of the Firebase app used to store the archive information. Go to https://firebase.com to get a valid URL. If you leave the default value, archiving will not work correctly.

FB_AUTH_SECRET.description: Firebase Auth secret for the database. Go to https://firebase.com to get a valid URL and secret. If you leave the default value, archiving will not work correctly.
